actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Randolph-Sheppard Act Amendments (title II of Public Law 93-516).

summary.text: Amends the Randolph-Sheppard Act Amendments to redefine "Federal property" and "vending facility" for purposes of the blind vending stand program. Limits "Federal property" to areas accessible to the general public. Excludes any cafeteria and vending machine operated by the General Services Administration primarily for Federal employees from "vending facility".

titles.title: A bill to amend the Randolph-Sheppard Act Amendments (title II of Public Law 93-516).
